law.text: In addition to the requirements set forth in this chapter, the appropriations committees of each house or the Legislative Research Commission, as appropriate, may require additional information and may prescribe the form in which such additional information shall be submitted as a part of, or in support of, a branch budget recommendation.
law.history: Created 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 450, sec. 18, effective July 1, 1983.
